about_the_game:
Along with the theme song, The Final Battle, there are 29 soundtracks in the original album. The soundtracks received almost 100% satisfaction from the testing players!

The original soundtracks of Raid on Taihoku are produced by the famous composer, Wei-fan Chang, known for his soundtrack production of the video game, Detention, and the movie, Demigod: The Legend Begins. The band, Sofia, who is known for their participation in recording the soundtracks for the movie, Star Wars, also took part in the game’s sound production.

We worked with Enno Chang, who is known for conveying immersive emotions with her choreography, on the theme song, The Final Battle. Woven with lots of orchestra, decorated with gramophone effect and the sampling of the Hirohito Surrender Broadcast, the song sophisticatedly reflects the ebbs and flows of the time.

All wars are fought twice, the first time on the battlefield, the second time in memory.
-Vietnamese novelist, Viet Thanh Nguyen

Air raid sirens, flying bombers, exploding bombs, desperate cries and animal’s howls… Sayako stands alone on the battle field, trying to piece together her memories.

Only miss a home when becoming homeless.

It is not only an album, but a love letter, for those people who bravely step forward though once being hurt in the history.
